transcript: the most expensive belief in the world is that there's something outside of yourself that's preventing you from making money you give all the power to something outside of yourself whenever you cast your power or blame towards gender race zip code country whatever you may be 100% right but it doesn't help you at all as soon as you give that as the reason then you give yourself the excuse of why you're not going to get it and then you remove all power you have over the situation and so it is the most expensive belief because it's the one that costs you everything that you could potentially have if you didn't have that belief
